Reach [i](This creature can block creatures with flying.)[/i]
Deathtouch [i](Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)[/i]
notes:
2k17
Whenever Daelish Arbalest blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with flying, Daelish Arbalest gains deathtouch until end of turn. > Deathtouch
